entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
